author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is to fix the issue discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49202
The bug in write_MINIAOD of Tier-0 config leads to 4% bigger of MINIAOD size.

#### PR validation:
Run miniaod from new config, output size is as expected.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
This PR should be backported to 15_0 and 15_1 (for data taking)
title: Remove miniAOD_customizeOutput, and define miniaod file parameter directly in EventContent
